item.title: It's always interesting to see what one keeps ...
item.description: It's always interesting to see what one keeps when they purge a room, house, or garage for whatever reason. Before I do any of that, i ask my kids to see if they want anything - you never know what odd thing contains a vivid memory for someone else.

item.title: I enjoyed reading about the lock, how interesting!...
item.description: I enjoyed reading about the lock, how interesting! When I was a kid, we vacationed in Northern Michigan and we always made a point to visit the Soo Locks (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soo_locks)in the St. Mary's River. It amazed me the way Mother Nature was circumvented and …
